description:
In this course you will learn to profit from WordPress. How to legally take WordPress themes and plug-ins and sell them as your own. Also, how to avoid any copyright issues.

Learn How To Make Huge Profits Selling Premium WordPress Themes And Plug-ins

Learn to profit from WordPress

Where to download premium themes for free

Where to sell for huge profits

Learning how to sell WordPress themes and plug-ins is a fantastic business model. Low start-up costs that can produce fantastic results including a case-study that a $100 investment returned a $6000+ profit.

Let me answer a few questions on selling themes and plug-ins:

You mention you can legally steal WordPress themes and plug-ins is that really fine to do this?

Yes, it is 100% legal and above board if you copy the steps I have outlined.

Is there any startup costs?

For themes you can get started for no costs and for plug-ins you can get started for under $100.

Is it difficult to do this?

No, if you follow the simple steps you could be selling a theme with an hour or two.

Will this become saturated if a lot of people buy this course ?

No, there are dozens of places to sell and market for plug-ins and themes is massive.

Do I need to know any programming to deal with plug-ins?

No any programming if needed can be outsourced for low cost.

How much can I make?

It really depends but the rewards can be huge for small investments.

Do I get to see any examples in this course?

Yes, I reveal a plug-in that cost me a $100 to develop and made over $6000.

Any other skills I need to have?

No, there is no special skills needed.

How long will it take master the strategy?

You will be able to understand it after watching this course as isnâ€™t complex

Content and Overview

This course contains over 17 lectures and nearly 1 hour of content. It is designed for anyone, regardless of experience level, who wishes to learn how to sell WordPress themes and plug-ins for profit.

Students will learn how to source premium themes and plug-ins and sell for great profits.

Simply put at the end of the course you will be able to sell premium WordPress products.

You'll know where to download premium themes , and how to sell these 100% legally without any issues.

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Nearly 1 hour of content over 17 lectures
  • How to source premium themes and plug-ins.
  • Learn how to sell for great profits.
  • Suitable for beginners as videos explain system in good detail
  • Breaks the whole process down in to simple easy to understand steps
title: Blueprint to Legally Selling WordPress Themes & Plug-Ins
